column2: "We'll be transfering you to the resurrected Evil Dragon once again."
"We have observed an energy difference from the last encounter, thus we expect it to put up a tough fight. Please pay attention to its movement and attacks."
"Alisa will support us once more! With your powers, we're sure that you'll be able to prevail!"

"We have detected a strong energy
source from inside Cuent Castle!
Please go there and assist Alisa!
Because this operation will be dangerous,
only specific ARKS may assist.
――――――――――――――――――――
Can clear $(0) time(s), rankings in effect.
Damage Limit: 999999
Failure Conditions / Time limit runs out"

"Quest Objective [Defeat the Dragon!]

Quest fails if the time limit runs out."
